question: The third Third Raisina Dialogue was held in __________.
explanation: The third edition of the geo-political conference - Raisina Dialogue was held in New Delhi. It was inaugurated by Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu. The event is jointly organized by the Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) and Observer Research Foundation (ORF). The theme of the conference for this year is 'Managing Disruptive Transitions: Ideas, Institutions, and Idioms'.
